long_description: A true outdoor classic, the women's Greenland Rain Jacket from Fjallraven is made of sturdy polyester/cotton infused with Greenland wax for water resistance and toughness. Originally developed in 1968 in collaboration with members of a Greenland expedition, the jacket was made out of tent material and proved to be extremely durable for climbers. Fjallraven's G-1000 polyester/cotton fabric is infused with Greenland wax (beeswax and paraffin) for wind and water resistance; fabric also resists mosquitoes. You can apply more wax if you want the jacket to be more water resistant. G-1000 reinforcements on the shoulders and yoke. 2-way zipper; snaps down the front, on the 4 external flap pockets, and at the sleeve cuffs. Fjallraven Greenland Rain Jacket for women has a snugly fitting hood.
short_description: A true outdoor classic, the women's Greenland Rain Jacket from Fjallraven is made of sturdy polyester/cotton infused with Greenland wax for water resistance and toughness.
